title: National debt of Germany in relation to gross domestic product 2010 to 2024
yAxis: National debt as percent of GDP
summary: In general National debt as percent of GDP has fallen over the Year.
National debt as percent of GDP is slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2021.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum National debt as percent of GDP, about 74.67 was reported at Year 2014
Minimum National debt as percent of GDP about 51.1 was reached at Year 2021
min_summary: Overall National debt as percent of GDP has decreased over the Year.
National debt as percent of GDP is slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2021.
mid_summary: Overall National debt as percent of GDP has decreased over the Year.
